short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows Pharmsmart software to Connect to Methsmart Device

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Extension allows Pharmsmart Methadone Software to connect to the Methsmart Hardware, allowing quick and accurate dispensing within the Pharmacy.
